caption: Relating to the determination of resident status of students by public institutions of higher education.
summary: This bill modifies Texas education code regarding resident status determination for higher education. It removes provisions allowing undocumented students who graduated from Texas high schools to qualify for in-state tuition. Chinese students and other international students must be legally present in the US to be considered residents. Those previously classified as residents but lacking legal status can be reclassified as non-residents.
translation: 该法案修改了德克萨斯州教育法典中关于高等教育居民身份认定的规定。它删除了允许在德克萨斯州高中毕业的无证学生获得州内学费待遇的条款。中国学生和其他国际学生必须在美国合法居留才能被视为居民。此前被归类为居民但缺乏合法身份的学生可能被重新归类为非居民。
